title: Start
body:
Scavenger: Greetings Traveler, what brings you to this world?

[[43096834...|LeaveGone]]
[[a763742576...To seek knowledge|MORE]]

title: MORE
body:
Scavenger: For one thing, surprised you speak in hex! You must be far out from this quadrant. I don't got much knowledge for you I'm afraid. Where you exactly from Stranger?

[[Earth|Earth]]

title: Leave
body: Scavenger: I'll let you be on your way partner.

title: Earth
body: Scavenger: Earth you say? Never heard of it. Most of the databases and libraries were destroyed when the Unknown came. Good luck out here friend, stay in the light if possible.
